Control Name: AC-6 (1) AUTHORIZE ACCESS TO SECURITY FUNCTIONS
Control Statement: The organization explicitly authorizes access to [Assignment: organization-defined security functions (deployed in hardware, software, and firmware) and security-relevant information].
